document.title: Illegal Immigration and the U.S. Labor Market of the 1990s
document.abstract: Public testimony by Prof. Briggs given before the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims of the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, April 5, 1995.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation:
Briggs, V. (1995). Illegal Immigration and the U.S. Labor Market of the 1990s. In Impact of illegal immigration on public benefit programs and the American labor force: hearing before the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims of the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, pp. 95-100, (see also pp. 93-94 for oral comments). Washington, DC: U.S. Government Printing Office.
http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/briggstestimonies/16

file.description: Impact of Illegal Immigration on Public Benefit Programs and the American Labor Force
